text:
Bogdan was a great host and he was very responsive to all my messages both before I arrived in Bucharest and during my stay. He was at the location to welcome me and give me an overview of the most important points.
The home is lovely, with great vews of the city, it was really clean and smelt lovely. Getting around was easy as its this place is fairly central and the road referenced in my guidebook as the place to explore. As a solo female traveller in a new city, I felt really safe in Bucharest and that mainly came from the first impression of Bogdan and his home.
I definitely want to return to Bucharest for a longer stay and would have no hesitation to stay here again.
Thank you
